text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali received Saudi businessman and chairman of the investment group Al-Baraka Sheikh Salah Kamel. Kamel informed Ben Ali on Al-Baraka's investment plans in Tunisia.
- Ben Ali held a meeting with Industry Minister Slaheddine Bouguerra on developement of investment in the industry sector.
- Tunisia's northern costline unharmed from dangerous seaweed "Caulerpa Taxifolia".
